text:
@BarackObama MEMORIAL DAY 2020

As We Pause Today To Honor Our Fallen, Please Note #covid19 Has Killed More Americans Than The Following Wars Combined:

Revolutionary War, 
Vietnam War,
Iraq War, 
War of 1812,
War in Afghanistan

9️⃣7️⃣,7️⃣2️⃣2️⃣
US #coronavirus Dead https://t.co/YTRvGD2Q81
